thread.title: Strewth! Australia making Civ debut in next DLC
thread.title_full: Strewth! Australia making Civ debut in next DLC

author: Alice O'Connor
title: Strewth! Australia making Civ debut in next DLC
text: Australian will join Sid Meier’s globedwar for the first time in new DLC for Civilization 6 [ official site ], 2K have announced. WW2-era Prime Minister John Curtin will rise from the grave to lead them. Continuing the theme, 2K have also announced that the ‘Australian Summer’ update is “coming soon” to add neat-o features like official mod tools with Steam Workshop support and the option to play as teams in multiplayer. … [ visit site to read more ]
